sentences.english: A set of jade pendants on a girdle is one unique kind of Chinese personal ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 組玉佩是中國人獨有的一種隨身佩帶的玉飾物。

sentences.english: After the exhibition, "jade wearing" melts in the water.
sentences.chinese: 展覽結束時，“玉佩”也在水中融化消失。

sentences.english: Wild gave both the wek-jin and cloud, let her away.
sentences.chinese: 雲狂把玉佩又給了樂兒，讓她收好。

sentences.english: Cloud crazy be companions call away, LeEr ravel he didn t save himself but just want to the rationale.
sentences.chinese: 雲狂被同伴叫走，樂兒糾結他不救自己卻只想玉佩。

sentences.english: This jade pendant is our family heirloom.
sentences.chinese: 這塊玉佩是咱們家的傳家寶。

definition: ornamental thumb ring (originally a ring, often made from jade, worn by archers in ancient times to protect the right thumb when drawing a bowstring)
penannular jade pendant (often used as a symbol of separation or resolution, for homophony reasons)
(archaic) wooden or metal token of authority/(fig.) decree/directive/(computing) token
weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]

tiger tally (a two-piece object made in the shape of a tiger, used in ancient China as proof of authority. One half of a tally could be issued to a military officer and this would be matched with the other half when verification was required.)
official seal/imperial or royal seal/papal bull
Karakax County in Hotan Prefecture 和田地區|和田地区[He2 tian2 Di4 qu1], Xinjiang
